summary: Lets have a look on immensive \"HD sky\" ,,with more better colour ,better clouds, true hd sun and with hd constellation stars
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-1-1348594576.jpg[/img]
[/center]
*************************************************************************************************
[Size=8]
[color=Green]
Indroduction :
[/color]
[/Size][size=5]
                    @LINK FOR THE BINIARY FILE IS ==http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0112.htm

                    @This is the perfect enb for skyrim as it includes many effects + \"DX11 DOF\" with very high performance.

                    @The enb is a combination of new effects and new setting\'s.

 [color=Green]-Its is highly recommended that you Read the installation process as \"Their are some new steps\".[/color]

                    @The enb is already good with it\'s own AA , so please switch the AA of in the \"Skyrim setings\"otherwise the game will look extra softened, although you can give it a try.

                      
                    @The enb will provide you really good colouring

                    @The features are described bellow----------
[/size]
*****************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-2-1348595011.jpg[/img]

*****************************************************************************************************
[size=8]
[color=red]
Features
[/color]
[/size][size=5]-\"Dirext-x 11\" Dept of field
                    -Ultra realisting lightning.
                    -Some new DX11 effects .
                    -Most realistic Nights.
                    -Ultra graphical sun with dust particle effect.
                    -Realistic fire color with new fire effect.
                    -\"HIGH PERFORMANCE\".{one of the best feature}
                    -Realistic environment colors ,not too much bright.
                    -Better water reflections . 
                    -No need of \"AA\" thus increase more performance.
                    -Cinematic , grain , and normal Dof Optional files.
                    -Maximum focus effect....
[/size] [center]
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-3-1348595011.jpg[/img]

***************************************************************************************************

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-1-1348595010.jpg[/img] [/center]


[size=8][color=green]
Installation -
[/color][/size][size=5][color=green]
                1- Extract the downloaded file .....

                2- Now firstly open and check the readme file and then the important image.

                3- Now open the \"main files\" folder and copy all the files from the folder to your skyrim directory.
                   
                4- Now download the \"Biniary file\" from the above given link and copy it to your skyrim
                   directory along wiht \"enb files\" 
 
                5- Start the \"skyrim launcher\", It will set set the default settings,,But you have to change the 
                   settings according to the \"improtant image file\" 
               
                6- Low end users can use their own settings .  
         
                7- It is highly recommended that you set the \"AA = of\" , Because game will not work on some computers
                   if it is on .{This step is for both High end users and Low end users} 

                8- Make sure that all the \"esp\" files are active in \"DATA OPTION \"{Otherwise the game will crash}  
             
                9- Now enjoy the lovely game .
[/color][/size] [center]
******************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-1-1348595765.jpg[/img]

******************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-2-1348595765.jpg[/img]

******************************************************************************************************
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/15067-1-1348648233.jpg[/img]

[/center]
[size=5]
Recommended mods -
               1} W.A.T.E.R
               2} Flora overhaul 
               3} Ehnanced distant terrain.
               4} All character ehnanced mods. {like no more blocky faces}
               5} Enhanced_Night_Skyrim_v04_Color_Galaxy.
[/size]    

[size=6]
Credit
[/size][size=4] 
             * Very.. very thanks to \"skyrim\" game maker.
             * Very much thanks to the {enb} inventor-\"Boris\"          
[/size]
author: Hritik
